name: Ext_R4B_SubscriptionStatus_eSSS
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.SubscriptionStatus.eventsSinceSubscriptionStart for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents SubscriptionStatus.eventsSinceSubscriptionStart from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubscriptionStatus|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Events since the Subscription was created
element.definition: The total number of actual events which have been generated since the Subscription was created (inclusive of this notification) - regardless of how many have been successfully communicated.  This number is NOT incremented for handshake and heartbeat notifications.
element.comment: `SubscriptionStatus.eventsSinceSubscriptionStart` maps to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.eventsSinceSubscriptionStart`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
